## ArtifactOptions type

Type definition for ArtifactOptions. These are the options supported by this Booter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ArtifactOptions = {
    dirs?: string | string[];
    extensions?: string | string[];
    nested?: boolean;
    glob?: string;
};
```
